source.5da37539:
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from autoxgb import AutoXGB
source.7b56903e:
axgb = AutoXGB(
    train_filename="../input/tabular-playground-series-nov-2021/train.csv",
    output="output_1",
    test_filename="../input/tabular-playground-series-nov-2021/test.csv",
    targets=['target'],
    use_gpu=True,
    task = None,
    idx = ['id'],
    num_folds=5,
    features = None,
    categorical_features = None,
    seed=42,
    num_trials=100,
    time_limit=360,
    fast=False,
)
axgb.train()
source.467bf5b0: # Kindly upvote if you liked the work. Thanks 😊
source.e290ccfc:
# AutoXGB Starter ⚡️

**AutoXGB is a package that bundles XGBoost and Optuna together**

This package is created by Abhishek Thakur. Please refer the repo for more info - https://github.com/abhishekkrthakur/autoxgb

Note: Install AutoXGB with -no--deps for now, as shown below. As of 1-Nov, there is an issue with the pyarrow dependancy that creates an error. If you are reading this at a later time, for latest updates please refere the github repo mentioned above
